title: Email address change problem
body:
i want to change my Email address but i cant because i deleted the email i have associated with my account 

What do i do 

How do i solve this problem 

Riot help

Btw why do you send verification code for the new email to the OLD email 

that makes NO sense

replies.body: We'd like to help you out with this!  Hit us up by [submitting a support ticket](http://ticket), and we'll respond asap.  I recommend checking out our[ account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide in the meantime to prepare for any ownership verification that may be required.  Thanks for your patience!

i submitted a ticked i think yesterday here's the link to it

 please look into it asap

=======> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/22660798

1. Go to the top right corner of the website.
2. Click on your name.
3. Click "Settings".
4. Click "Change email address".
5. Type in your new email address.
6. Ensure you don't delete or lose access your new email.

Then refer to [Deep Terror Nami's post.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/LE0amLmt-email-address-change-problem?comment=0002)

Haven't changed my email since creation so I have faced this challenge.

If you're unable to change your email through your profile (because you can't accept the change verification sent to your old email) please submit an account recovery [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to assist you.
